verses.verse: It happened after <S%H310><s%> these things, <S%H1697><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> tested <S%H5254><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H85><s%> "Abraham!" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Here I am."

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Now <S%H3947><s%> take your son, <S%H1121><s%> your only <S%H3173><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> whom you love, <S%H157><s%> even Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and go into the land <S%H776><s%> of Moriah. <S%H4179><s%> Offer him <S%H5927><s%> there for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> which I will tell you of. <S%H559><s%>"

Abraham <S%H85><s%> rose early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and saddled <S%H2280><s%> his donkey, <S%H2543><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of his young men <S%H5288><s%> with him, <S%H3327><s%> and Isaac his son. <S%H1121><s%> He split <S%H1234><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> for the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of which God <S%H430><s%> had told him. <S%H559><s%>
On the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> far off. <S%H7350><s%>

Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his young men, <S%H5288><s%> "Stay <S%H3427><s%> here with the donkey. <S%H2543><s%> The boy <S%H5288><s%> and I will go <S%H3212><s%> yonder. <S%H3541><s%> We will worship, <S%H7812><s%> and come back to you. <S%H7725><s%>"

Abraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> it on Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%> He took <S%H3947><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> and the knife. <S%H3979><s%> They both <S%H8147><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

Isaac <S%H3327><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "My father? <S%H1><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Here I am, <S%H1121><s%> my son." He said, <S%H559><s%> "Here is the fire <S%H784><s%> and the wood, <S%H6086><s%> but where is the lamb <S%H7716><s%> for a burnt offering? <S%H5930><s%>"

Abraham <S%H85><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> will provide <S%H7200><s%> himself the lamb <S%H7716><s%> for a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> my son. <S%H1121><s%>" So they both <S%H8147><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

They came <S%H935><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which God <S%H430><s%> had told <S%H559><s%> him of. <S%H85><s%> Abraham built <S%H1129><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> there, <S%H6186><s%> and laid the wood <S%H6086><s%> in order, <S%H6186><s%> bound <S%H6123><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> him on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> on <S%H4605><s%> the wood. <S%H6086><s%>
Abraham <S%H85><s%> stretched out <S%H7971><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the knife <S%H3979><s%> to kill <S%H7819><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to him out of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Abraham! <S%H85><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Here I am."

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Don't <S%H7971><s%> lay your hand <S%H3027><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the boy, <S%H5288><s%> neither do <S%H6213><s%> anything <S%H3972><s%> to him. <S%H6258><s%> For now I know <S%H3045><s%> that you fear <S%H3373><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> since you have not <S%H3808><s%> withheld <S%H2820><s%> your son, <S%H3173><s%> your only son, <S%H1121><s%> from me."

Abraham <S%H85><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and saw that behind <S%H310><s%> him was a ram <S%H352><s%> caught <S%H270><s%> in the thicket <S%H5442><s%> by his horns. <S%H7161><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and offered him up <S%H5927><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of his son. <S%H1121><s%>

Abraham <S%H85><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Yahweh <S%H3070><s%> Will Provide. <S%H834><s%> As it is said <S%H559><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> "On Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s mountain, <S%H2022><s%> it will be provided. <S%H7200><s%>"
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%> a second time <S%H8145><s%> out of the sky, <S%H8064><s%>

and said, <S%H559><s%> "I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> by myself, <S%H5002><s%> says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> this thing, <S%H1697><s%> and have not <S%H3808><s%> withheld <S%H2820><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> your only son, <S%H3173><s%>

that I will bless <S%H1288><s%> you greatly, <S%H1288><s%> and I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> greatly <S%H7235><s%> like the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and like the sand <S%H2344><s%> which is on the <S%H3220><s%> seashore. <S%H8193><s%> Your seed <S%H2233><s%> will possess <S%H3423><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his enemies. <S%H341><s%>
In your seed <S%H2233><s%> will all the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> be blessed, <S%H1288><s%> because <S%H834><s%> you have obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%>"

So Abraham <S%H85><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to his young men, <S%H5288><s%> and they rose up <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> to Beersheba. <S%H884><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> lived at Beersheba. <S%H3427><s%>

It happened after <S%H310><s%> these things, <S%H1697><s%> that it was told <S%H5046><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H4435><s%> Milcah, she also has borne <S%H3205><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> to your brother <S%H251><s%> Nahor: <S%H5152><s%>
Uz <S%H5780><s%> his firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> Buz <S%H938><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> Kemuel <S%H7055><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Aram, <S%H758><s%>
Chesed, <S%H3777><s%> Hazo, <S%H2375><s%> Pildash, <S%H6394><s%> Jidlaph, <S%H3044><s%> and Bethuel. <S%H1328><s%>"

Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Rebekah. <S%H7259><s%> These eight <S%H8083><s%> Milcah <S%H4435><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s brother. <S%H251><s%>
His concubine, <S%H6370><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Reumah, <S%H7208><s%> also bore <S%H3205><s%> Tebah, <S%H2875><s%> Gaham, <S%H1514><s%> Tahash, <S%H8477><s%> and Maacah. <S%H4601><s%>
